casebody.data:
JOHN M. GROTTOLE ET AL. v. FRANK DEMILO ET AL. (14675)

Dupont, C. X, and Landau and Spear, Js.

Argued December 12, 1995 decision released January 23, 1996 *910Janine M. Becker, with whom, on the brief, was Daniel Shepro, for the appellants (defendants). Francis C. Vignati, for the appellees (plaintiffs). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed, and the case is remanded for the purpose of setting a new law day.
